LanguageData.TDiner.RadiusNote: Note: The radius displayed from tables is not exact. When pawns search for a place to eat, they search for chairs, not tables. Therefore there may be a few tiles difference between the displayed circle and actual results.
LanguageData.TDiner.TDDefault: Set to Table Diner default value
LanguageData.TDiner.ExtraFeatures: Use Table and Pawn specific radii
LanguageData.TDiner.ExtraDisabled: Feature Disabled. Restart Rimworld to remove tab.
